Menu Menu 1 event found. << ALL EVENTS Caledonia Brewing (Dunedin) Events Venues Caledonia Brewing (Dunedin) Caledonia Brewing (Dunedin) Started by friends and beer enthusiasts that were home brewers, we decided to take our passion and skills to the next level in our beer-centric home town of Dunedin, FL where we work, live, and play. Caledonia is a name given to Scotland by the Romans and is a nod to the local Scottish heritage here in Dunedin (Sterling Scotland is our sister city). Scotland‚Äôs National animal, the unicorn is featured in our logo and decor as well as the Scottish flag, The Saltire. We are known for our Rat Arsed Scotch Ale and its little brother Half Arsed Scottish Ale. We also host The Dunedin Chapter of the New World Celts monthly. Caledonia Brewing offers monthly paint and sip events in Dunedin with Wine & Canvas. See what‚Äôs on the calendar by visiting our EVENTS CALENDAR page. You can learn more about the brewery by checking out their WEBSITE LINK. Caledonia Brewing (Dunedin) 587 Main St. Dunedin , FL 34698 United States Get Directions (727) 351-5105 https://www.caledoniabrewing.com Events at this venue Today Upcoming Upcoming Select date. History and Hours ‚Äì Caledonia Brewing ‚Äì Dunedin, FL Menu Skip to content Home Order Online Menu & Merch Events History & Hours Photos Caledonia Drinking Society History and Hours Opened April 6th 2017, Caledonia Brewing is a small batch craft brewery in the heart of Downtown Dunedin, FL. We‚Äôre housed in the historic 1924 Dunedin Times building at 587 Main St. Focusing on natural and organic ingredients we serve many of our own small batch craft beers along with some local guest taps from time to time. Caledonia also offers several varietals of wine and other drinks like hard seltzers, sangria and ciders. We also offer many NA beer and options. Our taproom is a large open space with community tables that are perfect for parties, meet ups, meetings, events and games. Call Hollie at 727-351-5105 to reserve a date or table at Caledonia. ¬†We also have a covered pet friendly outdoor patio with seating and a bike rack. We are locally owned and operated and members of the Florida Brewers Guild, Brewers Association, Downtown Dunedin Merchants Association and Dunedin Chamber of Commerce. Started by friends and beer enthusiasts that were home brewers, we decided to take our passion and skills to the next level in our beercentric home town of Dunedin, FL where we work, live and play. Caledonia is name given to Scotland by the Romans and is a nod to the local Scottish heritage here in Dunedin (Sterling Scotland is our sister city). Scotland‚Äôs National animal, the unicorn is featured in our logo and decor as well as the Scottish flag, The Saltire. We are known for our Rat Arsed Scotch Ale and its little brother Half Arsed Scottish Ale. We also host The Dunedin Chapter of the New World Celts monthly. Hours Monday 2pm-12am Tuesday 2pm- 12am Wednesday 2pm-12 am Thursday- 2pm-12am Friday- 12pm-12am Saturday-12pm- 12am Sunday-12pm- 10pm 21 and up after 8pm Call (727) 351-5105 2 Responses to History and Hours Pingback: FL AM Group Luncheon ‚Äì Sat, June 8 | Florida AM Group Pingback: Florida Focus ‚Äì 1st Installment ‚Äì Small Towns | The Multifamily Site Leave a Reply Cancel reply You must be logged in to post a comment. Upcoming Events ‚Äì Caledonia Brewing ‚Äì Dunedin, FL Menu Skip to content Home Order Online Menu & Merch Events History & Hours Photos Caledonia Drinking Society Upcoming Events Bonsai and Brews every 3rd Wed at Caledonia Brewing Caledonia Brewing ¬†at The Dunedin Beer Fest 2017 Weekly and Monthly Events Caledonia Drinking Society Member Night- every Tuesday, members enjoy $1 off mug fills. Member renew in March, any open spaces will be chosen via lottery. Music Trivia every Thursday ‚Äì Join us for Tampa bay‚Äôs original and best music trivia. We do it every Thursday at 7:30 pm, all decades, all genres music. Prizes for the top 3 teams and the top team gets to hoist the coveted unicorn trophy in glory. Hosted by Big Trophy Trivia. Retrograde: Music Videos from the 80‚Äôs and 90‚Äôs ‚Äì VJ Hural Knight plays all your favorite Alternative and New Wave Music Videos from the 80‚Äôs and 90‚Äôs on the TVs at Caledonia. We do this every Sunday night from 7-10pm 21 and up. New World Celts Monthly Meeting ‚Äì NWC meet the 1st Monday of every month, come meet some new friends and see what great things they do for our community. Bonsai Workshop with Thunderstruck Bonsai ‚Äì Aug 20th 7pm. ¬†(3rd Wed of every month) Come pick a tree and a pot and then turn it into a beautiful Bonsai with all instruction and materials provided. Get tickets here Mandala Monday ‚Äì Aug 25th 6:30 pm-Join Jennifer of HomeGrown & RockSolid for this fun & creative class learning simple techniques to create your own mandala creation. Sign up here Bacon Brunch ‚Äì Sept 7th 11:30am Palate Culinary Services serves up a delicious gourmet brunch here at the brewery. Tickets required. Pop Up Plant Shop with Evergreen Plant Experience ‚Äì Sept 3rd 6-9 pm Backspin with DJenerate- Aug 15th, 3rd Friday of every month, DJ playing old school themes, requests and more Music Bingo ‚Äì ¬†Aug 18th 7:30pm-3rd Mon of every month, Free to Play , 21 and up Bubbles and Bingo ‚Äì ¬†2nd and 4th Tuesday of each month, Our own Alex is hosting ¬†Bingo night at Caledonia. Join her for traditional bingo with a bubbly twist . We will have specials on Prosecco and Champagne as well as discounted charcuterie. 21 and up Paint Workshop with Wine and Canvas ‚Äì Aug 27th 6pm Special Events Hops for Hope Fundraiser and donation collectio n Aug 22nd 5-8pm Yacht Rock Party Aug 31st 8pm Oktoberfest at Caledonia Sept 26-28 Caledonia Wine and Beer Mixer Sept 30th 7pm What We Brew in the Shadows Vampire Soiree Oct 10th 8pm Thanksgiving Eve Dance Party Nov 26th 8pm-midnight Upcoming Live Music- All shows after 8pm are 21 and up Joe Denny and the Joy Riders Aug 23rd 8pm Crackerbillys Aug 30th 8pm Boney Fiend Sept 6th 8pm Trey Wanvig Duo Sept 12th 8pm Jazz Phools Oktoberfest Band Sept 27th 8pm Sam Williams Oct 3rd 8pm Peaches and Karim Oct 11th 8pm Matt Zitwer Duo Nov 1st 8pm Stick and Ditty Nov 8th 8pm 12 Strings and A Fiddle Nov 15th 8pm Taylor Jansen Trio Nov 29th 8pm Want to schedule your event here? Bonsai & Brews at Caledonia Brewing | Dunedin (727) 266-6791‚Ä¨ Larry@ThunderstruckBonsai.com Facebook Instagram RSS Facebook Instagram RSS My Account Checkout 0 Items About Us Shop Events Events Information Bonsai & Brews Locations Frequently Asked Questions Calendar Blog & Resources Gallery Contact Us Select Page Home Events Archive Bonsai & Brews Events Bonsai & Brews at Caledonia Brewing | Dunedin Date Wed, Sep 17 2025 Time 7:00 pm - 9:00 pm Cost $75.00 GET TICKETS Bonsai & Brews Events Bonsai & Brews at Caledonia Brewing | Dunedin Join Thunderstruck Bonsai for Bonsai & Brews at Caledonia Brewing !¬†Whether you‚Äôre brand new to bonsai or just looking for a creative night out, this event is designed to be fun, approachable, and unforgettable. We‚Äôll kick things off with a quick intro to bonsai, then dive into styling your own tropical pre-bonsai tree. You‚Äôll choose your tree and ceramic pot, and we‚Äôll guide you through pruning, wiring, and potting; step by step. No experience needed, and all materials and tools are provided for the workshop. Caledonia Brewing offers a cozy, laid-back vibe with a rotating selection of house-brewed beers, local guest taps, cider, and wine. It‚Äôs the perfect setting to relax, sip something delicious, and create something you‚Äôll be proud to take home. Each Ticket Includes: ‚Äì A tropical species pre-bonsai tree ‚Äì Ceramic glazed bonsai pottery ‚Äì Instructions to style and care for your new bonsai tree ‚Äì Wire, bonsai soil, and substrate ‚Äì Use of all necessary¬†tools provided ‚Äì Aftercare instructions and guidance Space is limited and these events tend to sell out, especially in Dunedin. Grab your tickets early and come grow with us! Share this event + Add to Google Calendar + iCal / Outlook export X Location Caledonia Brewing 587 Main Street, Dunedin, FL, USA 1 Select Ticket 2 Attendees 3 Checkout Dates: Wed, Sep 17 2025 7:00 pm - 9:00 pm Wed, Oct 15 2025 7:00 pm - 9:00 pm Wed, Nov 19 2025 7:00 pm - 9:00 pm Event Ticket | Caledonia $75 Available Tickets: 14 Caledonia Brewing | Dunedin The "Event Ticket | Caledonia" ticket is sold out or not available for some of dates. You can try another ticket or another date. Total: 0 Next Tags Bonsai Bonsai & Brews Caledonia Brewing Dunedin Events Tampa Bay Workshops Labels Dunedin Organizer Larry Naeder Phone 727-266-6791 Email larry@ThunderstruckBonsai.com Website Larry Naeder | Thunderstruck Bonsai Other Organizers Artists Larry Naeder Larry Naeder Larry Nader is the owner of Thunderstruck Bonsai, a nursery dedicated to creating living bonsai art. His deep passion for bonsai artistry has earned him widespread recognition and respect in the bonsai community. Larry has displayed his trees at the EPCOT International Flower & Garden Festival for three consecutive years, showcasing his skill. He has participated in various national bonsai exhibitions, where his work has been celebrated for its artistic quality and technical execution. As the owner of Thunderstruck Bonsai, Larry has built a thriving business dedicated to nurturing and cultivating premium bonsai specimens. He is deeply committed to fostering a strong sense of community through education and consultation on bonsai care. Larry actively engages with the community through workshops and educational events, teaching enthusiasts and newcomers about the artistry and techniques of bonsai. In addition to his impressive achievements, Larry serves as the Vice President of the Suncoast Bonsai Society and is a member of the BSF Epcot Committee. He is also a dedicated student of renowned bonsai artist Nacho Marin, further enhancing his expertise and artistry. Justin Zabinski Justin Zabinski Next Occurrences Wed, Oct 15 2025 7:00 pm -  9:00 pm Wed, Nov 19 2025 7:00 pm -  9:00 pm Thunderstruck Bonsai 5.0 Based on 159 reviews powered by G o o g l e review us on JG Douthat 19:53 17 Dec 24 This was a great class! I had been looking forward to learning more about bonsai and how to start off and I was surprised at how much I learned and enjoyed my time. I would highly recommend to anyone wanting a fun outing! Steve Poisall 12:59 16 Dec 24 Great information, fun atmosphere, quality products! Erin Roberts 00:16 08 Dec 24 We had a great time trimming and repotting our Bonsai‚Äôs! The Thunderstruck crew were so helpful and knowledgeable and made it a really fun afternoon. Definitely would do this again.‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è See All Reviews Reviews TSB-Unique-ID-2025 Thunderstruck Bonsai 5.0 Based on 159 reviews powered by G o o g l e review us on JG Douthat 19:53 17 Dec 24 This was a great class! I had been looking forward to learning more about bonsai and how to start off and I was surprised at how much I learned and enjoyed my time. I would highly recommend to anyone wanting a fun outing! Steve Poisall 12:59 16 Dec 24 Great information, fun atmosphere, quality products! Erin Roberts 00:16 08 Dec 24 We had a great time trimming and repotting our Bonsai‚Äôs! The Thunderstruck crew were so helpful and knowledgeable and made it a really fun afternoon. Definitely would do this again.‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è Walt Blenner 22:36 04 Dec 24 Knowing nothing about growing Bonsai trees, we eagerly took Larry's class and in 2 hours or less came away with all we need to make a go of it. Larry was instructive, knowledgeable and patient with our group who demonstrated no skills in this new living hobby. There's much more to learn if we want to expand beyond one growing Jade plant, but I'm looking forward to more of Larry's good talents. carmen stockton 15:18 04 Dec 24 It was a great time‚Ä¶. Learned a lot and would love to do it again!!! Very nice teachers!! Errol Stewart 05:00 27 Nov 24 Man, those guys gave an incredibly well laid out, informative and hands on presentation presentation covering Bonsai.  All of their folks were knowledgeable and knew how to interact with folks who didn't really have a clue...  If you are considering dabbling in bonsai plant, I highly recommend one of their courses... Misty Heath 22:18 27 Apr 24 The venue was great. The instructor very knowledgeable and walked us through styling our bonsai. We had a great time. Leonard Mencio 15:30 24 Apr 24 What a great Birthday gift by my wife! She registered us last weekend with Thunderstruck Bonsai‚Äôs ,‚ÄúBonsai and Brews Event‚Äù for my Birthday, and we had a phenomenal time. Dunedin Times ‚Äì Caledonia Brewing ‚Äì Dunedin, FL Menu Skip to content Home Order Online Menu & Merch Events History & Hours Photos Caledonia Drinking Society Tag Archives: Dunedin Times Our Location By admin | February 23, 2016 - 3:54 pm | February 23, 2016 Uncategorized Leave a comment We are proud to live, work, and play in beautiful downtown Dunedin. It is the oldest city south of Cedar Key in Florida, founded in 1899 and named after Edinburgh, the capital of Scotland. This city and Caledonia Brewery have strong Scottish heritage and are proud of our roots. The city is home to the annual Dunedin Highland games and we are neighbors of the Scottish American society. We are also close to Florida Auto Exchange Stadium, the Spring training site for the Toronto Blue Jays as well as one of the worlds best beaches, Honeymoon Island. We are located on the gateway of historic Main Street and are housed in the old Dunedin Times Building, the original hometown newspaper that was built in 1925. The newspaper was printed here until 1965 and then became home to a popular local business Dunedin Printing. We are happily restoring the building to its original glory.
